N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.16 - Repayment

State Regulations

If repayment of an award is required, such repayment
shall be made in accordance with the the provisions of Education Law, section
605. I f compliance with the repayment schedule would involve extreme hardship
to the award recipient, the president of the Higher Education Services

Corporation may make such adjustments in repayment terms as may be appropriate, including waiver or suspension of all or part of the outstanding amount, subject to approval by the commissioner. Extreme hardship shall include only
serious illness or other circumstances beyond the control of the award
recipient, which illness or circumstances render it impossible to repay the
loan as provided above. It shall not include family commitments or
inconvenience. Notes
